about: "Create admin and student dashboards with role-based access"
title: "Add multi-role dashboards and role-based views"
labels: frontend,ux,backend

# Role-based Dashboards

Create distinct dashboard views for Admin and Student roles:

- Admin: overview of activities, pending enrollments, manage activities and students.
- Student: list of signed-up activities, ability to unregister.

Acceptance criteria:
- Dashboard route shows different content based on role.
- Navigation links and UI updated.
